showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Tifa}
“What's the matter?
Are you all alone?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // {Tifa}
“Huh?
What could that be?”{PAUSE}“There's something stuck deep inside
that looks like a key…
It's hard to get out.”{PAUSE}“Well, I'll just let it go
for now…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // {Tifa}
“There's something stuck deep inside
that looks like an old key…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // {Tifa}
“I wonder if there's some
way to get this outta here.”{PAUSE}“If I just move this…
And push that…
Okay! I got it out!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:34}); // {Cid}
“Huh?
The hell's this?”{PAUSE}“Looks like a key but
it's stuck way down inside, and
I can't get it out.”{PAUSE}“Well, what the hell?
That's life…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:35}); // {Cid}
“Hey…what's that?
Looks like a key but
it's stuck way down inside and”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // {Cid}
“Okay, there's gotta
be a way to get it out.”{PAUSE}“Maybe if I move this a bit…
and push that over…
HAH! Gotcha!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // {Cid}
“Damn, that's…
This is bad!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // {Cid}
“N, nothin'!!
You and {Cloud} get inside quick!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:46}); // {Cid}
“Hey, don't worry about a thing.
I ain't about to die that easily.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:48}); // {Cid}
“Okay, here I go!
Watch this!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “It's bad enough with earthquakes and Meteor,
but on top of all that now the Lifestream has
become active again, too.”{PAUSE}“I hope it doesn't blow and cause a panic
like it did before.
That was really bad, I tell ya.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “Huh? Never seen you here before.
You from outta town?
How're things on the outside?”{PAUSE}“Between the earthquakes and Meteor…
It just might be the end of the world
like everyone's been sayin'…”{PAUSE}“Oh, how depressing!
What a miserable world
this is…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:49}); // “That kid got a green stone from
that Chocobo!
I'm so jealous.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “Everything must come to an end.
And someday it's gonna be your turn.
The world's gotta end sometime.”{PAUSE}“Everybody goes sometime or another.
And everyone gets left too.
It's just fate…”{PAUSE}“It's sad, but there's nothing
that can be done about it.
So that's why I'm prayin'
for all of you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Tifa}
“Excuse me!
That person you
were just talking about…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:31}); // “It's amazing he recovered.
When they carried him here after they
first discovered him, I thought
for sure he was a goner.”{PAUSE}“That boy must have one powerful
guardian angel watchin' over him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // “It was really sad…but weird.
He was holding this really long
sword.”{PAUSE}“I dunno. The whole thing feels
unlucky to me. But the amazing
thing was those weird blue eyes…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // “Poor kid…
He must've drifted from
somewhere pretty far away.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // “Yeah…up ahead here…
At the, uh, clinic…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // “So how is the boy?
Poor kid.
He sure got the worst of
whatever it was…”{PAUSE}“Sure hope he gets better soon.
Right now is when he really needs
to hold on and not give up.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “I guess it's been about a week now
since he washed up here on the shore…
Poor pokey-headed young thing…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // “Yeah…a villager found him
a little ways down the coast…
It was about a week ago I think.”

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:39}); // “Gather 'round, gather 'round, this
is a bargain!!”{PAUSE}“We've got the best armor and weapons,
the likes of which you won't
find anywhere else.”{PAUSE}“But it's first come, first served,
so get yours now!”{PAUSE}“Step right up!
You there, don't just
stand around outside.”{PAUSE}“Go on in! Come on!
Don't be shy, step right up!”{PAUSE}“I'll never know why he wanted to
open a store in a dead town like this.
What's with him? …sigh…”

dialogStrings: Mideel

“Ahoy! Hey ain't you a beaut.
This here's Mideel.
It's a quiet little Hot Springs town.”{PAUSE}“Just the perfect place
for old folks like us
to live out our lives.”{PAUSE}“I hear that things ain't so peaceful
on the outside.
But here it's still nice and quiet.”

“Ahoy! This here's Mideel.
A quiet Hot Springs town…
At least it used to be…”{PAUSE}“Lately the sea's been in a tizzy.
Lifestream has been mixin' things up
at the bottom of the ocean.”{PAUSE}“I think the Planet's pretty angry, too.
We've pretty much done whatever we've
wanted to the Planet up till now.”

“Huh? Never seen you here before.
You from outta town?
How're things on the outside?”{PAUSE}“Between the earthquakes and Meteor…
It just might be the end of the world
like everyone's been sayin'…”{PAUSE}“Oh, how depressing!
What a miserable world
this is…”

“It's bad enough with earthquakes and Meteor,
but on top of all that now the Lifestream has
become active again, too.”{PAUSE}“I hope it doesn't blow and cause a panic
like it did before.
That was really bad, I tell ya.”

“Everything must come to an end.
And someday it's gonna be your turn.
The world's gotta end sometime.”{PAUSE}“Everybody goes sometime or another.
And everyone gets left too.
It's just fate…”{PAUSE}“It's sad, but there's nothing
that can be done about it.
So that's why I'm prayin'
for all of you.”

{Tifa}
“What's the matter?
Are you all alone?”

{Tifa}
“You got lost didn't you?
Separated from someone you love?
Silly thing…”

“I guess it's been about a week now
since he washed up here on the shore…
Poor pokey-headed young thing…”

“It was really sad…but weird.
He was holding this really long
sword.”{PAUSE}“I dunno. The whole thing feels
unlucky to me. But the amazing
thing was those weird blue eyes…”

{Tifa}
“Wha!?”

{Tifa}
“Wh…wait a minute!!
What did you just say!?”

{Tifa}
“Excuse me!
That person you
were just talking about…”

“Yeah…a villager found him
a little ways down the coast…
It was about a week ago I think.”

“Poor kid…
He must've drifted from
somewhere pretty far away.”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}!!
It must be!!
It's {Cloud}!!”

{Barret}
“You sure!?”

{Barret}
“Uh…!?
Yo, {Tifa}!!”

{Red XIII}
“Over here!”

{Red XIII}
“Halt!”

{Cid}
“Heh, good job, {Tifa}.”

{Yuffie}
“BINGO!!”

{Yuffie}
“Oh, HEY!”

{Cait Sith}
“Jackpot!”

{Cait Sith}
“Wait up!”

{Vincent}
“You've found him.”

{Tifa}
“So where is he?
Is he safe!?
Where is he now?”

“Yeah…up ahead here…
At the, uh, clinic…”

{Tifa}
“He's alive!”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}…
{Cloud}'s alive!!”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}!!”

“So how is the boy?
Poor kid.
He sure got the worst of
whatever it was…”{PAUSE}“Sure hope he gets better soon.
Right now is when he really needs
to hold on and not give up.”

“It's amazing he recovered.
When they carried him here after they
first discovered him, I thought
for sure he was a goner.”{PAUSE}“That boy must have one powerful
guardian angel watchin' over him.”

{Tifa}
“Huh?
What could that be?”{PAUSE}“There's something stuck deep inside
that looks like a key…
It's hard to get out.”{PAUSE}“Well, I'll just let it go
for now…”

{Tifa}
“There's something stuck deep inside
that looks like an old key…”

{Cid}
“Huh?
The hell's this?”{PAUSE}“Looks like a key but
it's stuck way down inside, and
I can't get it out.”{PAUSE}“Well, what the hell?
That's life…”

{Cid}
“Hey…what's that?
Looks like a key but
it's stuck way down inside and”

{Tifa}
“I wonder if there's some
way to get this outta here.”{PAUSE}“If I just move this…
And push that…
Okay! I got it out!”

{Cid}
“Okay, there's gotta
be a way to get it out.”{PAUSE}“Maybe if I move this a bit…
and push that over…
HAH! Gotcha!”
Received "Beat-up Useless Old Key"!

“Gather 'round, gather 'round, this
is a bargain!!”{PAUSE}“We've got the best armor and weapons,
the likes of which you won't
find anywhere else.”{PAUSE}“But it's first come, first served,
so get yours now!”{PAUSE}“Step right up!
You there, don't just
stand around outside.”{PAUSE}“Go on in! Come on!
Don't be shy, step right up!”{PAUSE}“I'll never know why he wanted to
open a store in a dead town like this.
What's with him? …sigh…”

{Cid}
“What's this?”

{Cid}
“The Lifestream is gushing up
from below the surface of the earth!”

{Cid}
“Damn, that's…
This is bad!!”

{Tifa}
“{Cid}!?
What's wrong?”

{Cid}
“N, nothin'!!
You and {Cloud} get inside quick!!”

{Tifa}
“But I…”

{Cid}
“Hey, don't worry about a thing.
I ain't about to die that easily.”

{Tifa}
“Be careful!”

{Cid}
“Okay, here I go!
Watch this!!”

“That kid got a green stone from
that Chocobo!
I'm so jealous.”
